subject: Re: [Request received] SSL Certificate Renewal for thompsonroaddental.com.au
preview: ##- Please type your reply above this line -##  Hello WolfIQ Support,  We'd love to hear what you think of our customer service. Please take a moment to answer one simple question by clicking the link

full_threads.body:
##- Please type your reply above this line -##

Hello WolfIQ Support,

We'd love to hear what you think of our customer service. Please take a moment to answer one simple question by clicking the link below:

https://support.combinate.me/requests/30580/satisfaction/new/AlaavyVQii8eG5JHCzK6tEihy?locale=1176

Here's a reminder of what your ticket was about:

----------------------------------------------

WolfIQ Support, 19 Aug 2025, 10:04 GMT+10

No problem at all, Jenn!
Let me know if you have any other questions, always happy to help.



Thanks,
**Allie Borcena**
support@wolfiq.com.au
![Wolf IQ Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ca8d72bfcc95c3d5bd1dbf/68904ddf70bb87b3a6cae6c2_Group%209.png)
Wolf IQ doesn't just fix websites - we can help you...

✔ Get you more real, authentic 5-star **Google reviews**
✔ Launch **landing pages** for new marketing campaigns
✔ Run **digital health checks** on your online presence
✔ See what your visitors really want with **website heatmaps**

Just **reply to this email** with how we can help (or learn more at WolfIQ.com/services).

**About your Care Plan**
• Care Plans include hosting, maintenance and dedicated support each month.
• Lite Plans – 15 minutes / Pro Plans – 120 minutes / Expert Plans – 300 minutes.
• Additional is billed at $149/hr (inc GST) at the end of year month.
• Anything else we can help with? Start a new email—it helps us move faster and serve you better.
_____________________________

{#HS:3040973875-165553#} ![](https://secure.helpscout.net/notification/convo/read/3040973875/9258363542/)

Thanks, Allie!

Regards,
Jenn

Combinate
support@combinate.me
www.combinate.me
1300 247 018

----------------------------------------------

WolfIQ Support, 19 Aug 2025, 09:29 GMT+10

Hi Jenn,

Great question!

Just to clarify:

- The additional DNS updates won’t impact your website or domain redirect
- The redirect is already set up on our side
- As soon as the domain points to our server, the redirect will activate automatically, no extra steps needed

Let me know if there's anything else we can do, but feel free to reach out if anything else pops up!



Thanks,
**Allie Borcena**
support@wolfiq.com.au
![Wolf IQ Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ca8d72bfcc95c3d5bd1dbf/68904ddf70bb87b3a6cae6c2_Group%209.png)

Reply to this email or click the link below:https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/30556 ![](https://combinate.zendesk.com/system/photos/900084375383/Jenn2.jpg)**Jenn Nebres** (Combinate Support) 19 Aug 2025, 08:57 GMT+10 Hi team, Just to confirm, the above additional DNS record updates will **not** impact the website/domain redirection? Regards, Jenn Combinatesupport@combinate.mewww.combinate.me1300 247 018 ![](https://combinate.zendesk.com/system/photos/21381735797529/wolfIQ.png)**WolfIQ Support**7 Aug 2025, 12:20 GMT+10 Hi Jenn, Thanks again for the update-and just confirming that the SSL certificate has been successfully verified on our end. To complete the setup, additional DNS record updates are needed:**A Record**
> - **Name/Host:** @
> - **IP Address:** 162.159.134.42
> **CNAME Record**
> - **Name/Host:** www
> - **Domain Name:** thompsonroaddental.com.au
> Let us know if you need anything else, always happy to help! Thanks,**Allie Borcena**support@wolfiq.com.au ![Wolf IQ Logo](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/67ca8d72bfcc95c3d5bd1dbf/68904ddf70bb87b3a6cae6c2_Group%209.png)Wolf IQ doesn't just fix websites - we can help you... ✔ Get you more real, authentic 5-star **Google reviews**✔ Launch **landing pages** for new marketing campaigns ✔ Run **digital health checks** on your online presence ✔ See what your visitors really want with **website heatmaps**Just **reply to this email** with how we can help (or learn more at WolfIQ.com/services).**About your Care Plan**• Care Plans include hosting, maintenance and dedicated support each month. • Lite Plans - 15 minutes / Pro Plans - 120 minutes / Expert Plans - 300 minutes. • Additional is billed at $149/hr (inc GST) at the end of year month. • Anything else we can help with? ##- Please type your reply above this line -## Your request (#30556) has been updated. Reply to this email or click the link below: https://support.combinate.me/hc/requests/30556 Jenn Nebres (Combinate Support) 19 Aug 2025, 08:57 GMT+10 Hi team, Just to confirm, the above additional DNS record updates will not impact the website/domain redirection? Regards, Jenn Combinate support@combinate.me www.combinate.me 1300 247 018 WolfIQ Support 7 Aug 2025, 12:20 GMT+10 Hi Jenn, Thanks again for the update-and just confirming that the SSL certificate has been successfully verified on our end. To complete the setup, additional DNS record updates are needed: A Record
  • Name/Host: @
  • IP Address: 162.159.134.42
CNAME Record
  • Name/Host: www
  • Domain Name: thompsonroaddental.com.au
Let us know if you need anything else, always happy to help! Thanks, Allie Borcena support@wolfiq.com.au Wolf IQ doesn't just fix websites - we can help you... ✔ Get you more real, authentic 5-star Google reviews ✔ Launch landing pages for new marketing campaigns ✔ Run digital health checks on your online presence ✔ See what your visitors really want with website heatmaps Just reply to this email with how we can help (or learn more at WolfIQ.com/services).
